instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2850: What is 820-2850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no bluetooth - one USB port not working.
threads.message:
Are these related in anyway?
need help.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no bluetooth - one USB port not working.
threads.message:
Check if the other USB port work, if yes, in the bad one could be bad data coil, missing 5V...

For bluetooth, check for any damage around WiFi/Bluetooth connector also check if flex cable is not loose on any side...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no bluetooth - one USB port not working.
threads.message: Trackpad/keyboard working? If yes then issue is probably not related. First check data lines on USB port on diode mode.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no bluetooth - one USB port not working.
threads.message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 32942"]Check if the other USB port work, if yes, in the bad one could be bad data coil, missing 5V...

For bluetooth, check for any damage around WiFi/Bluetooth connector also check if flex cable is not loose on any side...[/QUOTE]

strangely wifi working perfect. but the bluetooth doesnt work at all. it doesnt even get detected.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no bluetooth - one USB port not working.
threads.message: Diode mode on USB data pins? Which port is not working? Checked the coil in the data lines? It may be 2 separate issues.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A no bluetooth - one USB port not working.
threads.message:
Hey duke, finally got around to this one. Replaced coil got it working bluetooth still not recognised but i have now marked this as a donor since it started presenting some gpu issues. what a waste of time...

thanks for your help bud.
